column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3

#Text=Back End Software Developer  Senior & Principal levels (Hybrid) Were building a number of Software Development teams to work cross-functionally on the latest cloud infrastructure and platforms to build services providing security for collaboration suites in Bangalore, India.

#Text=Were expanding our global footprint and Bangalore offers a clear opportunity to invest in specialist, diverse and... innovative talent in engineering and product management to help us accelerate our growth and achieve our mission.
#Text=Why join us?

#Text=Youll be getting in at the early stages, playing a key role in shaping the future of Mimecast in India  with the energy and excitement of a start-up environment - but the security and maturity of an established larger organisation with an ambitious vision and mission and investing in people, tech and products.
#Text=Were hiring Senior and Principal level Developers.
#Text=We want to hear from you if you have a desire to learn and experiment leveraging your prior knowledge and experience.
#Text=Were looking for people who are willing to take risks, do things differently and, most importantly, do things better.
#Text=Click here to listen to our CTPO and Developers talk about why now is an exciting time to join Mimecast.
#Text=Apply today and connect with one of our dedicated technical Talent Acquisition Partners.
#Text=Our Back End teams design, implement and operate the next generation of Mimecast products whilst contributing to the underlying Mimecast (X1) Platform.

#Text=You will work with Architects, Developers, Quality Engineers, and Product Managers to solve interesting problems at scale.You will be deeply engaged and hands-on in the full development lifecycle from designing, developing, testing, deploying, maintaining, monitoring, and improving our back-end platforms and environment.
#Text=Ideally you should have some of the following: Experience developing Java, Python or PHP applications (Go is a plus) in a cloud-service or micro-service approach.
#Text=Strong object-oriented programming skills following SOLID principles.
#Text=Experience building REST/HTTP microservices in Spring/Spring Boot.
#Text=Experience using and modifying Gradle based CI/CD pipelines, Terraform.
#Text=Experience with several PHP frameworks, including Symfony and Laravel Experience with containerization (Docker/Kubernetes).
#Text=Experience in AWS, particularly DynamoDB, S3/CloudFront, ElastiCache/Redis, OpenSearch, ECS, EC2, load balancing and ASGs, CloudWatch.
#Text=Experience with Kafka.
#Text=Knowledge of Domain Driven Design preferred.
#Text=Experience with Elasticsearch and MySQL/MariaDB.
#Text=Experience building high volume, scalable, distributed backend services.
#Text=Willingness to learn and be part of a polyglot squad.
#Text=Experience designing new features based on high-level architectures (Principal Level).
#Text=Experience of software security, security reviews and secure coding.
#Text=Expertise in TDD and delivering quality code and solutions.
#Text=Experience building and working with container-based applications.
#Text=Knowledge on how highly available distributed systems works.
#Text=Familiarity with SMTP and projects like RSPAMD/Post-fix is a plus.
#Text=Typical responsibilities will include: Senior Level (6-10 years experience) Good understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology.
#Text=Engage in backlog grooming, planning, design reviews, and code reviews.
#Text=Deliver Cloud based services through CI/CD.
#Text=Contribute to reviews of new features or enhancements.
#Text=Engage with the team through collaboration, problem solving, and teamwork.
#Text=Continually improve team efficiency, personal skills, and team skills.
#Text=Learn new technology trends and industry innovations.
#Text=Take initiatives and be resourceful.
#Text=Troubleshoot complex problems and define solutions for how to fix them.
#Text=Take ownership and create accountability within the team.
#Text=Principal Level (10 years experience) (All of the above plus) Design new features or enhancements based on high-level architectures.
#Text=Lead backlog grooming, planning, design reviews, and code reviews.
#Text=Lead security reviews of designs and implementations.
#Text=Act as a technical lead within the team through collaboration, problem solving and teamwork.
#Text=Apply technology trends and industry innovations to our products.
#Text=Coach and mentor team members on areas of experience.
#Text=Why Mimecast?
#Text=Were fast thinking.
#Text=We go big to reach our cyberattack-disrupting goals.
#Text=And we do what we need to protect the world of business from getting important (and potentially compromising) data stolen.
#Text=We never leave anyone behind.
#Text=We deliver quickly  and outstandingly.
#Text=Were big on honesty because it makes us better.
#Text=Were empowered by our mission.
#Text=And if cybercriminals have a good day, we work twice as hard to make the rest of their days a nightmare.
#Text=Thats The Mimecast Way.
#Text=And the Mimecast way is also a hybrid-working way.
#Text=We empower our people to balance their time between home and the office in a way that works best for them, their team, and our stakeholders.
#Text=Become a Mimecaster and put corporate data under your protection.
#Text=Fill our teams with respect.
#Text=And bring cybercrime-obstructing energy to your work.
#Text=Be passionate.
#Text=Be powerful.
#Text=Be alive with purpose.
#Text=DEI Statement Cybersecurity is a community effort.
#Text=Thats why were committed to building an inclusive, diverse community that celebrates and welcomes everyone  unless theyre a cybercriminal, of course.
#Text=Were proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer, and wed encourage you to join us whatever your background.
#Text=We particularly welcome applicants from traditionally underrepresented groups.

#Text=We consider everyone equally: your race, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, ability, marital status, nationality, or any other protected characteristic wont affect your application.
#Text=Due to certain obligations to our customers, an offer of employment will be subject to your successful completion of applicable background checks, conducted in accordance with local law.
#Text=We save companies the embarrassment of awkward data slip ups by disrupting cybercriminal activity.
#Text=We think fast, go big and always demand more.
#Text=We work hard, deliver  and repeat.
#Text=We grow with meaningful determination.
#Text=And put success well within our reach.
#Text=We empower each other, live by our values, and always deliver on our purpose.
#Text=We push each other to be better and expect to be pushed back.
#Text=This is a community of respect.
#Text=Where everyone is counted.
#Text=This is The Mimecast Way.
#Text=We are Mimecasters.

#Text=And we are alive with purpose Strong object-oriented programming skills following SOLID principles Experience building REST/HTTP microservices in Spring/Spring Boot Experience using and modifying Gradle based CI/CD pipelines, Terraform Experience with several PHP frameworks, including Symfony and Laravel Experience with containerization (Docker/Kubernetes) Experience in AWS, particularly DynamoDB, S3/CloudFront, ElastiCache/Redis, OpenSearch, ECS, EC2, load balancing and ASGs, CloudWatch Experience with Elasticsearch and MySQL/MariaDB Experience building high volume, scalable, distributed backend services Willingness to learn and be part of a polyglot squad Experience designing new features based on high-level architectures (Principal Level) Experience of software security, security reviews and secure coding Expertise in TDD and delivering quality code and solutions Experience building and working with container-based applications You will work with Architects, Developers, Quality Engineers, and Product Managers to solve interesting problems at scale.

#Text=You will be deeply engaged and hands-on in the full development lifecycle from designing, developing, testing, deploying, maintaining, monitoring, and improving our back-end platforms and environment.

#Text=Ideally you should have some of the following: Experience developing Java, Python or PHP applications (Go is a plus) in a cloud-service or micro-service approach Deliver Cloud based services through CI/CD Contribute to reviews of new features or enhancements Engage with the team through collaboration, problem solving, and teamwork.
#Text=Continually improve team efficiency, personal skills, and team skills.
#Text=Learn new technology trends and industry innovations.
#Text=Take initiatives and be resourceful Troubleshoot complex problems and define solutions for how to fix them.
#Text=Take ownership and create accountability within the team Lead backlog grooming, planning, design reviews, and code reviews.
#Text=Lead security reviews of designs and implementations
